alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:29AM CDT until June 14 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Prairie County in central Arkansas... Northern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Southwestern White County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 628 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vilonia, or 10 miles north of Little Rock AFB, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville... Cabot... Lonoke... Little Rock AFB... Beebe... Ward... Vilonia... Austin in Lonoke County... Enola... Old Austin... Parnell... Sylvania... Thurman... McRae... Sisemore... South Bend... Holland... Garner... Griffithville... Antioch in White County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
